text: Mana nabarerera ubwihotselefu okhurula mubutinyu, tsindolo tsiatila umukanda mulala mwinywe, Ne omukanda kundi mwinywe emioyo chiabu chiabakanakania okhula baparira Nyasaye amaparo kalali katoto, amaparo keshisilu, nibaboola; “Koo mana khulikho nende shiosishiosi mulikhuwa lino?” Boola; amakhuwa koosi nika Nyasaye, Bafisanga mumioyo chiabu kabalakhuboolelanga tawe. Baboolanga mbu; khubetsanga mbu khuli nende shiosishiosi mulikhuwa lino sikhwakhererwe ano tawe. Boola; “kata mubetsanga mutsinzu tsienyu, abahandichilwa okhufwa bakharulile, batsia habundu wabu abahandichilwa okhufwa bafwilao.” Kano ni okhubeela Nyasaye ateme kali mubilifu bienyu, ne yosie kali mumioyo chienyu.
